text: Lunania elongata is a species of plant of the phylum Tracheophyta of the class Magnoliopsida class in the family Salicaceae. It is mostly found in Guamuhaya Massif, Sancti Spiritus province, endemic to Cuba. It is threatened by habitat loss. It is an uncommon shrub or a small tree, as it is endangered due to cutting, logging, etc. It is confined to montane forest, and is rare. ==References== ==Sources== * elongata Category:Endemic flora of Cuba Category:Endangered flora of North America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lunania elongata
